setBlendColour(double, double, double) - Method in class bagel.DrawOptions
Sets the colour to blend the image with, where (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) is black and (1.0, 1.0, 1.0) is white.

Sets the colour to blend the image with, where (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) is black and (1.0, 1.0, 1.0) is white.
